name: Mamta (Love of mother)
description:
Mamta is small thanks to all mothers on this planet for their pain, sacrifices, care, unconditional love, and unconditional support for the life we have. no words can define mother, She is our emotion, feeling, first love, and our lifeline. This acrylic art piece was made to feel the respect for all mothers of this world. in this artwork, you can see a deep connection between mother and child.
This painting is made of 9 colors to give us a glimpse of 9 months when she carry us in her womb. The brightness on the face of mother and child represents the after birth care from feeding us to protecting us she is there for us every time for everything.
The unborn baby spends around 38 weeks in the womb of the mother that's why this art piece has 38 editions.
  "Mamta" is a celebration of motherhood.
